trans-unit.source: Specifies the properties that are in a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as propriedades que estão num <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A StylusPointDescription specifies which properties are associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Um StylusPointDescription Especifica as propriedades que estão associadas um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: For each property in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, the StylusPointDescription contains a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> object which specifies constraints such as the minimum and maximum values of the property.
trans-unit.target: Para cada propriedade num <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, StylusPointDescription contém um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>objeto que especifica as restrições, como os valores mínimos e máximo da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A> methods to check for these properties in the StylusPointDescription.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A>métodos para verificar se estas propriedades em StylusPointDescription.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A>

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must share the same StylusPointDescription.
trans-unit.target: Todos os <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objetos num <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>têm de partilhar o mesmo StylusPointDescription.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: If you try to add a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that has a different StylusPointDescription, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se tentar adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>que tem um StylusPointDescription diferente, será emitida uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that contains information for the properties <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor predefinido cria um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>que contenha informações sobre as propriedades <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: You must pass in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects for the properties, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de passar em <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>objetos para as propriedades, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> that specifies the properties in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um IEnumerable genérico do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> que especifica as propriedades no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects are identical.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> objetos são idênticos.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> objects are compatible if they contain the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects in the same order.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>objetos compatíveis se contêm o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>objetos na mesma ordem.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> para verificar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> para verificar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects are identical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> objetos são idênticos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a intersecção de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: `StylusPointDescription1` and `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo` may have a common property, yet the constraints specified in their respective <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects differ.
trans-unit.target: `StylusPointDescription1`e `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo` pode ter uma propriedade comum ainda as restrições especificadas no respetivo respetivos <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>objetos diferem.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: If the constraints differ, the GetCommonDescription method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> from `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo`.
trans-unit.target: Se as restrições diferem, o método de GetCommonDescription utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>de `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> para intersect.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> para intersect.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that contains the properties that are present if both of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> que contém as propriedades que estão presentes se ambos os especificado de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> para a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> that specifies the property of the desired <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> que especifica a propriedade do pretendido <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> para especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todas as propriedades do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém todas as <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> has the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> tem a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> tem especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> é um subconjunto de especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.
